sentences.en: He rose to lank height and grasped Billy McMahan's hand.
sentences.cn: 他瘦削的身躯站了起来,紧紧地握住比利·麦默恩的手.

sentences.en: I've got lank work to do.
Lacking shears, I tried to pull the longest , growing lank and weedy now, with my hands.
sentences.cn: 坟墓四周已经杂草丛生, 又高又细.因为没带剪刀, 所我只好用手拔掉杂草.

sentences.en: Lank grammar can both parse English and Chinese.
sentences.cn: 链接文法不仅可以用来分析英语句子,也可以用来分析汉语句子.

sentences.en: She had lank hair and sallow skin.
She looked at the lank figure leaning against the porch column, chewing a straw.
sentences.cn: 思嘉打量着这个靠在廊柱上 、 跟里嚼着干草的瘦个子.

sentences.en: She ran her fingers through her hair; it felt lank and dirty.
sentences.cn: 她用手指梳了梳自己的长发，头发摸起来又油又脏。

sentences.en: That will lank him in prison.
The old man has lank hair.
This is partly out of practical necessity: it is indeed thin and lank.
sentences.cn: 当然这里面有实际的必要性,我的发质稀疏平直.

trans.tran_cn: （头发）平直的，稀疏的，（人）瘦长的
trans.tran_en: lank hair is thin, straight, and unattractive
